Project Overview

Take A Hike is a business concept that provides transportation to and from a particular hiking destination with the option of having a hiking guide. This project involves brand development and implementation.

The challenege was to develop a total branding package for a new business concept focused on outdoor travels.

The fluid logo design and humanist typeface contribute to the outdoors nature of the brand. The complete package included business cards, stationery, and a mobile app design.

Role Designer | Developer | UXI/UI

Tools HTML5 | CSS3 | JavaScript | Photoshop | Illustrator

When September 2015
